official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase to $15,000,000 the exemption for certain small issues from treatment as industrial development bonds.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $10,000,000 to 15,000,000 the exemption for certain small issues from treatment as industrial development bonds, for purposes of the exclusion from gross income of the interest on such bonds.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase to $15,000,000 the exemption for certain small issues from treatment as industrial development bonds.
